FactorLargeAggregator.mainSelect: select C.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 C.cpod, --1 a.operando, --2 to_char(d.d_inizio_val, 'yyyymmdd') , --3 case when to_char(d.d_fine_val, 'yyyymmdd') is null then '99991231' else to_char(d.d_fine_val, 'yyyymmdd') end case ,--4 PARAMETRI_LARGE_FACTOR(A.OPERANDO,c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR,c.ctar1,d.d_inizio_val), --5 --5 b.id_operando --6 from z_parametro_operando_large a, z_anagrafica_operandi b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele C , DBI_USER.rpl_anu_t_param_valori_large d where a.TIPO= c.cfreq AND d.cd_punto= c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and a.ctar1=c.ctar1 and a.cd_parametro=d.cd_parametro_valore_large and C.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN (select c.cncon from z_test_contratti c where c.note='lotto 31' ) and a.operando = b.operando and b.tipo = 'FACTOR' --and to_char(d.d_fine_val, 'yyyymmdd') > '20080401' group by C.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, C.cpod, a.operando, to_char(d.d_inizio_val, 'yyyymmdd') , --3 b.id_operando , to_char(d.d_fine_val, 'yyyymmdd'), PARAMETRI_LARGE_FACTOR(A.OPERANDO,c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR,c.ctar1,d.d_inizio_val) order by a.operando

FactorLargeExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT PFACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 PFACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 PFACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 PFACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 Pfacts_f_factor.legacy, --4 Pfacts_f_factor.tipo, --5 Pfacts_f_factor.operand, --6 Pfacts_f_factor.saison, --7 Pfacts_f_factor.prog, --8 Pfacts_v_factor.legacy, --9 Pfacts_v_factor.tipo, --10 Pfacts_v_factor.ab, --11 Pfacts_v_factor.bis, --12 replace(to_char(Pfacts_v_factor.factor,'9990.9'),'.',','), --to_number(to_char(Pfacts_v_factor.factor)), --13 Pfacts_v_factor.tarifart, --14 Pfacts_v_factor.kondigr, --15 Pfacts_v_factor.prog --16 from Pfacts_key,Pfacts_f_factor,Pfacts_v_factor where Pfacts_key.legacy = Pfacts_f_factor.legacy and Pfacts_v_factor.legacy=Pfacts_key.legacy and Pfacts_f_factor.legacy=Pfacts_v_factor.legacy and Pfacts_f_factor.prog=Pfacts_v_factor.prog order by Pfacts_f_factor.prog
